law.history: Repealed 1984 Ky. Acts ch. 4, sec. 3. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Created 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 74, sec. 1, effective June 19, 1952.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Cabinet for human resources to visit, inspect and regulate sanatoria operated by city-county boards of health.
